title: The Fog
description: In an exclusive private school. students sexually assaulted and mutilated their teachers, then savagely turned on one another... at a seaside resort, thousands of people joined in a monstrous act of self-destruction... in a lonely room, an old lady was shredded and eaten by her beloved pet cats... in the city, mass copulation and insane slaying spread.Time was running out for mankind...The Fog. James Herbert's classic horror story.
author: James Herbert
